summary: RESPECTED OFFICER,  DRIVER'S SIDE SEAT BELT CHIME NOT WORKING IF SEAT BELT IS NOT LATCHED - I AM NOTICING HAPPENING FOR ABOUT 1 YEAR.   ENGINE IS MAKING LOT OF VIBRATION AND SOUND WHEN IDLE - THIS IS HAPPENING SHORTLY SOON AFTER I BOUGHT THIS CAR 08/2015.  THERE IS A MOVING OBJECT DETECTION SYSTEM WHICH SOMETIMES WORK AND SOMETIMES DOES NOT WORK - I AM NOTICING THIS FOR ABOUT THE LAST 4 MONTHS.  BELOW I PUT A DATE OF 10/1/2015 REFLECTING THE ENGINE PROBLEM. THANKS
